text:
Again an intense,
almost unbearable joy overwhelmed him for an instant, as it had in
the police-office.

I understand how annoying it is, but in your place,
Rodya, I would laugh at them, or better still, spit in their ugly faces,
and spit a dozen times in all directions.
Hm...
He could lie on the sofa.

All our acquaintances avoided us, nobody even bowed to us in the
street, and I learnt that some shopmen and clerks were intending to
insult us in a shameful way, smearing the gates of our house with pitch,
so that the landlord began to tell us we must leave.

He will try to catch
me.
“If anyone had come in, what would he have thought?

Half an hour earlier, while he was bringing
Raskolnikov home, he had indeed talked too freely, but he was aware of
it himself, and his head was clear in spite of the vast quantities he
had imbibed.

“Not quite, that’s true,” Razumihin agreed at once, getting warm and
hurried as usual.
Damnation, these thoughts again!

‘I
am ready to do anything to please you, Tit Vassilitch!’ That’s a way of
going on!

So you really imagined that I meant by ‘government
quarters’... he-he!
“I say, sir,” the girl shouted after him.

I present
myself--a landowner, a widower, of a well-known name, with connections,
with a fortune.
Raskolnikov recognised Katerina Ivanovna at once.

It was a long,
blackened wooden building, and in spite of the late hour there were
lights in the windows and signs of life within.

I know you don’t believe in it--but don’t be over-wise; fling yourself
straight into life, without deliberation; don’t be afraid--the flood
will bear you to the bank and set you safe on your feet again.
Calm yourself.
“Money?

“What, you here?” he began in surprise, speaking as though he’d known
him all his life.

“Judging from that remark, we may certainly presume that you were
reckoning on our helplessness,” Dounia observed irritably.
No one paid attention to him.

“You can’t help getting pale... if you’ve
nothing to eat,” he added, with difficulty articulating the words.
It was still light, but beginning to get dusk.

He came here on two successive
evenings to see Sofya Semyonovna.
